task: create an empty file name it Readme
add the output of the command `date` as the first line to your Readme (without copy/paste)
Make git_rocks into a git repo
create your first commit that has the Readme file
create a public github repo git_rocks
add it as your remote to the local git_rocks
push the commit you have to github
in github, add hello from github to the Readme file
pull the changes you made in github to your local git_rocks
